WaitForJobCompletion(IJobOperations, String, Nullable<TimeSpan>, Nullable<TimeSpan>) WaitForJobCompletion(IJobOperations, String, Nullable(Of TimeSpan), Nullable(Of TimeSpan))

Edit

Wait for completion of a Job.

public static JobGetResponse WaitForJobCompletion(this IJobOperations operations, string jobId, TimeSpan? duration = null, TimeSpan? waitInterval = null)<ExtensionAttribute>
Public Shared Function WaitForJobCompletion(operations As IJobOperations, jobId As String, duration As TimeSpan? = Nothing, waitInterval As TimeSpan? = Nothing) As JobGetResponse
Parameters
operations
IJobOperations IJobOperations
jobId
String String

Required. The id of the job.

duration
Nullable<TimeSpan> Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

Optional. The maximum duration to wait for completion of job before returning to client. If not passed then wait till job is completed.

waitInterval
Nullable<TimeSpan> Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

Optional. The interval to poll for job status. The default value is set from DefaultPollInterval property of HDInsight job management client.

Returns
JobGetResponse JobGetResponse

WaitForJobCompletionAsync(IJobOperations, String, Nullable<TimeSpan>, Nullable<TimeSpan>) WaitForJobCompletionAsync(IJobOperations, String, Nullable(Of TimeSpan), Nullable(Of TimeSpan))

Parameters
operations
IJobOperations IJobOperations
jobId
String String

Required. The id of the job.

duration
Nullable<TimeSpan> Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

Optional. The maximum duration to wait for completion of job before returning to client. If not passed then wait till job is completed.

waitInterval
Nullable<TimeSpan> Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

Optional. The interval to poll for job status. The default value is set from DefaultPollInterval property of HDInsight job management client.

Returns
Task<JobGetResponse> Task(Of JobGetResponse)
